Dami Elebe bụ onye na-ede ihe nkiri na Naijiria nke a maara maka usoro ntanetị dị ka Skinny Girl In Transit na Rumour Has It
Ọ bụ onye na-ahụ maka ikuku, onye na-ese ihe na onye egwu. Elebe gụrụ mgbasa ozi na nka.
Elebe bụ onye na-ahụ maka ikuku (OAP) na Classic FM, Beat FM na Naija FM n'ime afọ 7 wee dee ihe nkiri ahụ, Up North nke Tope Oshin duziri
Na ELOY Awards n'afọ 2018, ọ natara ihe nrite Scriptwriter Of The Year. Ihe nkiri izizi ya bụ From Lagos jiri ịhụnanya, nke dị na sinima n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2018
Ya na Sharon Ooja, Nonso Bassey, Jon Ogah, Etim Effiong, Damilola Adegbite, na Shaffy Bello rụkọrọ ọrụ.
N'abalị asaa nke ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2018, ọ kwupụtara na peeji Instagram ya na ọ ga-ahapụ Beat FM, na-akọwa oge ya na ụlọ ọrụ redio dị ka 'nnukwu njem'.
